name: ENEMY (宿敌)
lyrics:
ENEMY (宿敌) (《英雄联盟：双城之战》全球主题曲) - Imagine Dragons/JID/英雄联盟
   
Lyrics by：Dan Reynolds/Justin Tranter/Wayne Sermon/Ben McKee/Daniel Platzman/Robin Fredriksson/Mattias Larsson/Destin Route
   
Composed by：Dan Reynolds/Justin Tranter/Wayne Sermon/Ben McKee/Daniel Platzman/Robin Fredriksson/Mattias Larsson/Destin Route
   
Look out for yourself
为自己活
I wake up to the sounds of the silence that allows
不知不觉发觉 沉默可以让我
For my mind to run around with my ear up to the ground
想法自由自在 洞悉变化袭来
I'm searching to behold the stories that are told
让我看看是谁 当着我面微笑
When my back is to the world that was smiling when I turned
背着我面捅刀 满嘴胡编乱造
Tell you you're the greatest
人前夸你最出色
But once you turn they hate us
人后骂你最邪恶
Oh the misery
啊 难过
Everybody wants to be my enemy
每个人都想与我为敌
Spare the sympathy
别再假惺惺
Everybody wants to be
就是所有人都想
My enemy
与我为敌
Look out for yourself
为自己活
My enemy
与我为敌
Look out for yourself
为自己活
But I'm ready
来吧我不怕
Your words up on the wall as you're praying for my fall
你写在墙上的字 祈祷我堕落的词
And the laughter in the halls and the names that I've been called
对我的讥讽嘲笑 给我的恶名恶号
I stack it in my mind and I'm waiting for the time
全都扎在心里 早晚时机一到
When I show you what it's like to be words spit in a mic
就像嘴巴出子弹 你们一个别想逃
Tell you you're the greatest
人前夸你最出色
But once you turn they hate us
人后骂你最邪恶
Oh the misery
啊 悲惨
Everybody wants to be my enemy
每个人都想与我为敌
Spare the sympathy
收起你的假惺惺
Everybody wants to be
就是所有人都想
My enemy
与我为敌
Look out for yourself
为自己活
My enemy
为敌就为敌
Look out for yourself
要为自己活
Look Okay
嘿 听着
I'm hoping that somebody pray for me
希望有人祈祷为我
I'm praying that somebody hope for me
祈祷能有希望给我
I'm staying where nobody 'posed to be P-p-posted
待在不是人待的地方 内心炸响
Being a wreck of emotions
名字上榜
Ready to go whenever just let me know
言语一声 现在就能出发
The road is long so put the pedal into the floor
路很遥远 油门踩到爆炸
The enemy's on my trail my energy unavailable
敌人紧追 能量哪里不对
Imma tell 'em hasta luego
我得转头 跟他们说声再会
They wanna plot on my trot to the top
别想一路总给我 玩点什么邪念
I've been outta shape thinkin' out the box
坏脾气天生没怕 管你今天明天
I'm an astronaut I blasted off the planet rock
疯起来我手底下 不留任何情面
To cause Catastrophe and it matters more because I had it not
打碎你家玻璃可 别找我要抱歉
Had I thought about wreaking havoc on an opposition
搞点破坏又怎么 本性随时在线
Kinda shockin' they wanted static with precision I'm automatic quarterback
飞弹出膛轰轰轰 跟我冲一路向前
I ain't talkin' sacking pack it pack it up I don't panic batter batter up
闭嘴吧闭嘴吧我没说什么忌讳 慌什么慌什么攻击手已经就位
Who the baddest it don't matter cause we at ya throat
谁是坏蛋谁不是没有什么所谓 有种开门出来现在跟我对对
Everybody wants to be my enemy
每个人都想与我为敌
Spare the sympathy
别再假惺惺
Everybody wants to be
就是所有人都想
My enemy
与我为敌
Oh the misery
啊 痛苦
Everybody wants to be my enemy
每个人都想与我为敌
Spare the sympathy
别再假惺惺
Everybody wants to be
就是所有人都想
My enemy
与我为敌
Pray it away I swear I'll never be a saint no way
看开点 我不是圣人好意你省省
My enemy
与我为敌
Pray it away I swear I'll never be a saint
大度点 装什么圣人别再假惺惺
Look out for yourself
就要为自己活

comments.content: 我是哥谭噩梦，我的赞永远都是双数
梦龙上一次与英雄联盟合作已经是S4的事情了，warriors也是一首很好的歌啊，这次的主题曲有些贴近新专辑的风格，爱了爱了
不玩英雄联盟，但是动画剧集拍的太好了才过来听的
恭喜EDG获得2021全球总决赛冠军！四强面对三支来自韩国的强队，EDG连克强敌走到最后，恭喜EDG！
